mapper.select: select a.id, a.process_instance_id as process_instance_id, a.create_by as createBy, b.name as createByName, a.status as status, c.name as statusName, b.dept_id as deptId, e.name as deptName FROM cus_reim_apply a LEFT JOIN sys_user b on a.create_by=b.user_id LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary c on a.status=c.id LEFT JOIN sys_dept e on b.dept_id=e.dept_id WHERE a.id=#{id}
select a.*, a.type , c.name as typeName FROM cus_reim_apply_item a LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary c on a.type=c.id WHERE a.reim_apply_id =#{id}
select sum(a.rei_count) as reimCount FROM cus_reim_apply_item a WHERE a.reim_apply_id =#{id}
mapper.delete:
delete from cus_reim_apply where id in
#{id}
